pageContext.claim: “It was NEVER agreed that Robert Mueller could use one of his many Democrat Never Trumper lawyers to sit next to him and help him with his answers. This was specifically NOT agreed to, and I would NEVER have agreed to it. The Greatest Witch Hunt in U.S. history, by far!”
pageContext.analysis: Both the House Judiciary and Intelligence Committees granted a last minute request from Mueller to allow Aaron Zebley, Mueller’s former chief of staff, to appear alongside him. Zebley was sworn in as a witness before the House Intelligence Committee and served as an adviser to Mueller during the House Judiciary Committee testimony.
